name: Gurptuk Moss-Beard
aura: Increase Ally  in in all Battles by 50

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 1 turn on all allies under [Poison] debuffs.
skills.name: Biotic Staff
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs except [Poison] debuffs from an ally, then heals them by 30% of their MAX HP and places a [Shield] buff on the target equal to 20% of their MAX HP for 2 turns.
skills.name: Druidic Boon

skills.desc:
Places three 2.5% [Poison] debuffs on all allies for 3 turns. These debuffs cannot be resisted or blocked. 
Also has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Cloud of Spores
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Allies under [Poison] debuffs inflict 7.5% more damage for each [Poison] debuff on them, stacking up to a maximum of 30%. This damage increase applies to all of their skills.

Also increases each ally's RES by 15 for each [Poison] debuff on them.
skills.name: Symbiotes [P]
